name: Your Very Own Rising Pet
description:
As many of us IRL are looking for yeast and finding there isn't any in the stores, I've taken to trying to raise a sourdough baby. Here's that experience in game form! 

Your Very Own Rising Pet is a twine game playable in a browser as my Ludum Dare 46 submission. All you need is a mouse or your finger on touch compatible devices, and there are audio controls on the lefthand side. I hope you enjoy!
